summary.span: 提供一种从 SQL Server 数据库中读取只进的行流的方式。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of rows from a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建，必须调用方法的对象，而不是直接使用构造函数。To create a , you must call the method of the object, instead of directly using a constructor. 虽然正在使用中，关联是繁忙的服务，并可以在执行任何其他操作而不关闭它。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving the , and no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 这是种情况一直方法的调用。This is the case until the method of the is called. 例如，不能检索输出参数，直到调用后。For example, you cannot retrieve output parameters until after you call . 对结果集由另一个进程或线程读取数据时所做的更改可能会对用户可见`SqlDataReader`。Changes made to a result set by another process or thread while data is being read may be visible to the user of the `SqlDataReader`. 但是，确切的行为与时间有关。However, the precise behavior is timing dependent. 并是后可以调用的唯一属性已关闭。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed. 尽管可能会访问属性时存在，始终调用返回的值之前以保证返回精确的值。Although the property may be accessed while the exists, always call before returning the value of to guarantee an accurate return value. 使用顺序访问时 ()、 一个情况下会引发高级位置和另一个读取上一列上尝试执行操作。When using sequential access (), an will be raised if the position is advanced and another read operation is attempted on the previous column. > [!NOTE] > 为了获得最佳性能，可避免创建不必要的对象或对其进行不必要的数据副本。For optimal performance, avoids creating unnecessary objects or making unnecessary copies of data. 因此，多个调用方法如返回对同一个对象的引用。Therefore, multiple calls to methods such as return a reference to the same object. 如果您正在修改如由方法返回的对象的基础值要格外小心。Use caution if you are modifying the underlying value of the objects returned by methods such as . ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 一个，和一个。The following example creates a , a , and a . 该示例读取数据，将其写到控制台窗口。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console window. 然后关闭代码。The code then closes the . 结束时自动关闭`using`代码块。The is closed automatically at the end of the `using` code block. summary.span: 关闭 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须显式调用方法时都是通过使用使用关联用于任何其他用途。You must explicitly call the method when you are through using the to use the associated for any other purpose. `Close`方法在输出参数、 返回值的值中填充并`RecordsAffected`，增加关闭所需的时间`SqlDataReader`，它用于处理大型或复杂的查询。The `Close` method fills in the values for output parameters, return values and `RecordsAffected`, increasing the time that it takes to close a `SqlDataReader` that was used to process a large or complex query. 当返回值和受影响查询的记录数都不重要，若要关闭所花费的时间`SqlDataReader`可以通过调用减少关联的方法对象之前调用`Close`方法。When the return values and the number of records affected by a query are not significant, the time that it takes to close the `SqlDataReader` can be reduced by calling the method of the associated object before calling the `Close` method. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`连接、 DataReader 或在任何其他托管的对象上`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 一个`SqlCommand`，和一个。The following example creates a , a `SqlCommand`, and a . 该示例读取数据，将其写到控制台窗口。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console window. 然后关闭代码。The code then closes the . 结束时自动关闭`using`代码块。The is closed automatically at the end of the `using` code block. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最外面的表的深度为零。The outermost table has a depth of zero. SQL Server 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持嵌套，并且始终返回零。The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not support nesting and always returns zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行的查询按其性质，不返回行 （如 DELETE 查询），设置为 0。Executing a query that, by its nature, does not return rows (such as a DELETE query), sets to 0. 但是。However. 这不应混淆返回 0 行的查询 (例如，SELECT \* FROM*表*WHERE 1 = 2） 在这种情况下表，包括隐藏的字段中返回的列数。this should not be confused with a query that returns 0 rows (such as SELECT \* FROM *table* WHERE 1 = 2) in which case returns the number of columns in the table, including hidden fields. 使用 可排除隐藏的字段。Use to exclude hidden fields.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大多数情况下，这是该字段的确切长度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度如果`GetBytes`具有用于从字段中获取字节。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 这可能情况下，例如，如果正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置为。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果传递的缓冲区，则`null`，以字节为单位，不是剩余大小基于缓冲区偏移量参数中返回整个字段的长度。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the entire field in bytes, not the remaining size based on the buffer offset parameter. 不执行任何转换;因此，检索到的数据必须已经是一个字节数组。No conversions are performed; therefore, the data retrieved must already be a byte array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetOrdinal(string name) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetOrdinal (name As String) As Integer

summary.span: 在给定列名时获取相应的列序号。

span.span: Gets the column ordinal, given the name of the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetOrdinal` 第一次执行区分大小写查找。`GetOrdinal` performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失败，第二个，则会不区分大小写的搜索 (进行不区分大小写的比较使用数据库排序规则)。If it fails, a second, case-insensitive search occurs (a case-insensitive comparison is done using the database collation). 当比较受特定于区域性的大小写规则，会发生意外的结果。Unexpected results can occur when comparisons are affected by culture-specific casing rules. 例如，在土耳其语，下面的示例生成错误结果由于土耳其语中的文件系统对字母 i 不使用语言的大小写规则"文件"中。For example, in Turkish, the following example yields the wrong results because the file system in Turkish does not use linguistic casing rules for the letter 'i' in "file". 该方法将引发`IndexOutOfRange`异常，如果找不到从零开始的列序号。The method throws an `IndexOutOfRange` exception if the zero-based column ordinal is not found. `GetOrdinal` 不区分假名宽度。`GetOrdinal` is kana-width insensitive. 因为基于序号的查找比命名查找更有效，它是效率低下调用`GetOrdinal`在循环内。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call `GetOrdinal` within a loop. 节省时间，可以调用`GetOrdinal`一次，并且将结果分配给整数变量在循环内使用。Save time by calling `GetOrdinal` once and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable

summary.span: 返回一个描述 的列元数据的 。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the .
A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 有关方法按以下顺序返回有关每个列的元数据：For the method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 列DataReader column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|如果使用者可以将列设置为 null 值或提供程序无法确定使用者是否可以将列设置为 null 的值设置。Set if the consumer can set the column to a null value or if the provider cannot determine whether the consumer can set the column to a null value. 否则，不设置。Otherwise, not set. 列可能包含 null 值，即使它不能设置为 null 值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |BaseCatalogNameBaseCatalogName|包含的列的数据存储区中的目录的名称。The name of the catalog in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基本目录名称为 NULL。NULL if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|数据存储区中列的名称。The name of the column in the data store. 这可能是不同的列名称使用别名时才 ColumnName 列中返回。This might be different than the column name returned in the ColumnName column if an alias was used. 如果无法确定基本列名或列数据中的行集列是派生的但并不完全相同，如果存储一个 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|包含的列的数据存储区中的架构的名称。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基本架构名称，null 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseServerNameBaseServerName|通过使用 Microsoft SQL Server 的实例的名称。The name of the instance of Microsoft SQL Server used by the .| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|表或视图中包含的列的数据存储区的名称。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基表名称，null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |列名ColumnName|列; 的名称这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果这不能确定，则返回 null 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此名称始终反映当前视图或命令文本中的列的最新重命名。This name always reflects the most recent renaming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|从零开始的列序号。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此列不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|列中值的最大可取长度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 对于使用固定长度的数据类型的列，这是数据类型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type. 有关`nvarchar(MAX)`， `varchar(MAX)`，和`varbinary(MAX)`列存储在 SQL Server 数据库中，最大大小为 2 GB。For `nvarchar(MAX)`, `varchar(MAX)`, and `varbinary(MAX)` columns stored in a SQL Server database, the maximum size is 2GB. 如果这些列存储和访问文件，最大大小限制由文件系统。If these columns are stored and accessed as files, the limit on maximum size is imposed by the file system. 此值更改时使用`Type System Version`连接字符串中的关键字。This value changes when using the `Type System Version` keyword in the connection string. 对新类型它们表示为下层类型。For new types they are represented as downlevel types. 最大值数据类型返回的正常的 4k`nvarchar`和 8000 `varchar`。The MAX data types return the normal 4k for `nvarchar` and 8000 for `varchar`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[TRANSACT-SQL 参考](/sql/t-sql/language-reference)。For more information, see the [Transact-SQL reference](/sql/t-sql/language-reference).| |DataTypeNameDataTypeName|返回一个表示指定列的数据类型的字符串。Returns a string representing the data type of the specified column.| |IsAliasedIsAliased|`true`： 列名称是别名。`true`: The column name is an alias.

`false`： 在列名称不是别名。`false`: The column name is not an alias.| |IsAutoIncrementIsAutoIncrement|`true`: 列将值分配给新行以固定的增量。`true`: The column assigns values to new rows in fixed increments.

`false`: 列不会分配到新行以固定的增量值。`false`: The column does not assign values to new rows in fixed increments. 此列的默认值是`false`。The default of this column is `false`.| |IsColumnSetIsColumnSet|`true`: 列是列集的成员的稀疏列。`true`: The column is a sparse column that is a member of a column set.| |IsExpressionIsExpression|`true`: 列是表达式。`true`: The column is an expression.

`false`: 列不是表达式。`false`: The column is not an expression.| |IsHiddenIsHidden|`true`： 隐藏列。`true`: The column is hidden.

`false`: 列不隐藏。`false`: The column is not hidden.| |IsIdentityIsIdentity|`true`: 列是标识列。`true`: The column is an identity column.

`false`: 列不是标识列。`false`: The column is not an identity column.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`： 此列是一组的行集中的列，合起来看，唯一标识行。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 使用列集`IsKey`设置为`true`必须唯一地标识行集中的行。The set of columns with `IsKey` set to `true` must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 没有任何要求这组列是列的最小集。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 这组列可能会生成从基表主键、 唯一约束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index.

`false`: 列不需要唯一标识行。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |IsLongIsLong|`true`： 此列包含二进制长对象 (BLOB)，其中包含非常长的数据。`true`: The column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data. 很长数据的定义是特定于提供程序。The definition of very long data is provider-specific.

`false`: 列不包含二进制长对象 (BLOB)，其中包含非常长的数据。`false`: The column does not contain a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data.| |为只读IsReadOnly|`true`： 不能修改的列。`true`: The column cannot be modified.

`false`： 可以修改的列。`false`: The column can be modified.| |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|`true`: 列包含无法写入到的永久行标识符，且具有行的标识到除任何有意义的值。`true`: The column contains a persistent row identifier that cannot be written to, and has no meaningful value except to identity the row.

`false`: 列不包含无法写入到的永久行标识符，但其标识行以外没有有意义的值。`false`: The column does not contain a persistent row identifier that cannot be written to, and has no meaningful value except to identity the row.| |是唯一的IsUnique|`true`： 列的类型是`timestamp`。`true`: Column is of type `timestamp`.

`false`： 列的类型不是`timestamp`。`false`: Column is not of type `timestamp`.| |NonVersionedProviderTypeNonVersionedProviderType|而不考虑当前列的类型`Type System Version`连接字符串中指定。The type of the column irrespective of the current `Type System Version` specified in the connection string. 返回的值是从枚举。The returned value is from the enumeration.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果`ProviderType`是数值数据类型，这是列的最大精度。If `ProviderType` is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 精度取决于列的定义。The precision depends on the definition of the column. 如果`ProviderType`不是数值数据类型，这是 255。If `ProviderType` is not a numeric data type, this is 255.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果`ProviderType`DBTYPE_DECIMAL 或 DBTYPE_NUMERIC，小数点右侧的位数。If `ProviderType` is DBTYPE_DECIMAL or DBTYPE_NUMERIC, the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. 否则，这就是 255。Otherwise, this is 255.| |ProviderSpecificDataTypeProviderSpecificDataType|返回基于的列的特定于提供程序的数据类型`Type System Version`连接字符串中的关键字。Returns the provider-specific data type of the column based on the `Type System Version` keyword in the connection string.| |提供程序类型ProviderType|列的数据类型的指示符。The indicator of the column's data type. 如果列的数据类型而异行，这必须是对象。If the data type of the column varies from row to row, this must be Object. 此列不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |UdtAssemblyQualifiedNameUdtAssemblyQualifiedName|如果列是用户定义类型 (UDT)，这是为每个 UDT 的程序集限定的名称。If the column is a user-defined type (UDT), this is the qualified name of the UDT's assembly as per . 如果该列不是 UDT，则为 null。If the column is not a UDT, this is null.| |XmlSchemaCollectionDatabaseXmlSchemaCollectionDatabase|此 XML 实例的架构集合所在的位置，如果行中包含 XML 列的相关信息的数据库的名称。The name of the database where the schema collection for this XML instance is located, if the row contains information about an XML column. 此值是`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 如果在当前数据库中定义的集合。This value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection is defined within the current database. 如果没有架构集合，在这种情况下，这样做也为 null`XmlSchemaCollectionName`和`XmlSchemaCollectionOwningSchema`列也均为空。It is also null if there is no schema collection, in which case the `XmlSchemaCollectionName` and `XmlSchemaCollectionOwningSchema` columns are also null.| |XmlSchemaCollectionNameXmlSchemaCollectionName|此 XML 实例中，如果行中包含 XML 列的相关信息的架构集合的名称。The name of the schema collection for this XML instance, if the row contains information about an XML column. 此值是`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 是否存在任何关联的架构集合。This value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if there is no associated schema collection. 如果值为 null，`XmlSchemaCollectionDatabase`和`XmlSchemaCollectionOwningSchema`列也均为空。If the value is null, the `XmlSchemaCollectionDatabase` and `XmlSchemaCollectionOwningSchema` columns are also null.| |XmlSchemaCollectionOwningSchemaXmlSchemaCollectionOwningSchema|此 XML 实例的架构集合所在的位置，如果行中包含 XML 列的相关信息所属关系架构。The owning relational schema where the schema collection for this XML instance is located, if the row contains information about an XML column. 此值是`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 如果在当前数据库中定义的集合。This value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the collection is defined within the current database. 如果没有架构集合，在这种情况下，这样做也为 null`XmlSchemaCollectionDatabase`和`XmlSchemaCollectionName`列也均为空。It is also null if there is no schema collection, in which case the `XmlSchemaCollectionDatabase` and `XmlSchemaCollectionName` columns are also null.| > [!NOTE] > 若要确保元数据列返回正确的信息，必须调用与`behavior`参数设置为`KeyInfo`。To make sure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`. 否则，一些架构表中的列可能返回默认情况下，为 null，或不正确数据。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次执行区分大小写的查找。A case-sensitive lookup is performed first. 如果失败，进行第二个的不区分大小写搜索 (进行不区分大小写的比较使用数据库排序规则)。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made (a case-insensitive comparison is done using the database collation). 当比较受特定于区域性的大小写规则，会发生意外的结果。Unexpected results can occur when comparisons are affected by culture-specific casing rules. 例如，在土耳其语，下面的示例生成错误结果由于土耳其语中的文件系统对字母 i 不使用语言的大小写规则"文件"中。For example, in Turkish, the following example yields the wrong results because the file system in Turkish does not use linguistic casing rules for the letter 'i' in "file". 此方法是不区分假名宽度。This method is kana-width insensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认位置的之前第一条记录。The default position of the is before the first record. 因此，您必须调用才能开始访问任何数据。Therefore, you must call to begin accessing any data. 只有一个`SqlDataReader`每个关联一次，可以在打开和第一个关闭之前，任何尝试打开另一个将失败。Only one `SqlDataReader` per associated may be open at a time, and any attempt to open another will fail until the first one is closed. 同样，尽管`SqlDataReader`正在使用中，关联`SqlConnection`正忙于为服务它直到您调用。Similarly, while the `SqlDataReader` is being used, the associated `SqlConnection` is busy serving it until you call . ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 一个，和一个。The following example creates a , a , and a . 该示例读取数据，将其写到控制台窗口。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console window. 然后关闭代码。The code then closes the . 结束时自动关闭`using`代码块。The is closed automatically at the end of the `using` code block. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于确定 中的可见字段的数目。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，对分部主键执行 SELECT 将以隐藏字段的形式返回该键的其余部分。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隐藏的字段始终追加在可见字段之后。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
